notes: A bit of a introduction is required here. Dr. Pius Anyim and Barrister Ibru had both been baited previously by Johnny Molson and Any Lee live on their radio radio show (molsonandlee.com) and the results of the final kiss-off were pretty hilarious. If you want to listen to Pius and Ibru to set yourself up for this bait, then I highly recommend you check this out PIUS & IBRU "MELTDOWN" (MP3)
After contacting Johnny & Andy, they were kind enough to pass on the email addresses for Dr. Pius and Barrister Ibru. I wanted to see if I could get some phone action out of them too!
The results were pretty mixed, and the bait was quite short, but it was fun talking to these guys all the same
[Now I have the email addresses, I have to contact Dr. Anyim and make out that I'm an old target that couldn't reply to his first email]
[Dr. Anyim is kind enough to show me the original letter I received - although I never actually did receive it as he never sent it to me in the first place!]
[Shortly after, Dr. Anyim sends me another email]
[Barrister Ibru gets in touch and doesn't waste any time asking for cash!]
[OK. Now things start to kick into gear. Barrister Ibru contacts me on the telephone. Notice then when the codeword is given I play a short sample from Andy Lee shouting "Fruitecake!"]
[Less than 5 minutes later, Dr. Anyim gives me a call]

[I never returned the barrister's call, and I decided not to answer any of his other calls. My plan is to keep stalling him and get him really mad with me, hopefully resulting in a great phonecall later]
[Time to start turning the "get Ibru pissed-off" screw]
[There's trouble at scammer HQ. Ibru can't get his cash]
[Dr. Pius Anyim is non too impressed either]

[It should be noted that at this point both Dr. Pius Anyim and Barrister Ibru have called me several times on the telephone, but I have not picked up the phone. My plan is to ignore them and make them wait for a couple of days to build up their frustration. The Barrister sends me another message]

[Finally the next day, I decide to answer the Barrister's call, but he isn't expecting my response. I was expecting (actually hoping for) some abuse from Barrister Ibru, but it seems he wasn't ready for me standing up to him]
